Download Game!

[Introduction]
中国象棋，玩家vs电脑，可调节AI。

[Controls]
==========
操作说明:
==========
鼠标点击棋盘相应位置移动棋子(无须拖动)
B:开始(玩家黑方,电脑红方先走棋)
R:开始(电脑黑方,玩家红方先走棋)
P:悔棋
Enter:游戏菜单,设置选项中可调节电脑AI

==========
Controls:
==========
Click the chessboard to make a move(don't drag)
B: Begin (play as Black, computer move first)
R: Begin (play as Red, player move first)
P: Retract one move
Enter: Game menu, you can change computer AI in Options menu

[About]
Developer: Bruce
